Parameters: The URI of the requested image.
True if this drawable was loaded from the provided URI, or false if this drawable is a placeholder image instead.
onImageLoaded(android.net.Uri, android.g.Description: Listener method invoked when an image has been loaded.
onImageLoaded(android.net.Uri, android.g.FullName: public abstract void onImageLoaded (Uri uri, Drawable drawable, boolean isRequestedDrawable)

ClassDesc: Listener interface for handling when the image for a particular URI has been loaded.
